mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: SQUARE DANCES "Riptide", "Crawdad Song", and "The International Waltz". SPECIAL FEATURES "Participants - All", "The Oldtimers", "Meet Our Guest Caller: "Butch" Nelson", "Northwest High Notes", "Report on Summer Schools", and "Vacationists - Look Here!". REGULAR FEATURES "As I See It", "Help! For Your Square Dance Club", "The Square of the Month: Arnie Kronenberger", "'Round the Outside Ring", "The Green Sheet", "From the Floor", "Calendar of Square Dancing Events", and "On the Record".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
